channel.title: CVE Feed for Easy Social Feed -- Easy Social Feed
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Easy Social Feed -- Easy Social Feed

item.title: CVE-2024-30526|2024-06-04T17:39:47.385Z -- easy%20social%20feed -- easy%20social%20feed
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Easy Social Feed.This issue affects Easy Social Feed: from n/a through 6.5.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-30180|2024-03-27T11:26:37.970Z -- easy%20social%20feed -- easy%20social%20feed
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Easy Social Feed allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Social Feed: from n/a through 6.5.3.
